channel.title: 508-562 Client Help!
channel.description:
Ok, to keep this short and easy, whenever i download a client weather it be 508, 525, or 562 whenever i go to run it i get this error:
Exception in thread "main" java.lang.NoClassDefFoundError: client Caused by: java.lang.ClassNotFoundException: client at java.net.URLClassLoader$1.run(Unknown Source) at java.security.AccessController.doPrivleged(Native Method) at java.net.URLClassLoader.FindClass(Unknown Source) at java.lang.ClassLoader.loadClass(Unknown Source) at sun.misc.Launcher$AppClassLoader.loadClass(Unknown Source) at java.lang.ClassLoader.loadClass(Unknown Source) Could not find the main class: client. Program will exit. Press any key to continue...
Also, if i use like for example DragonScape 525 Ip changer, i type in the ip and server port it loads all the way but stops at "Loading World List Data" and doesnt move after that
Im kinda new to clients so any help or ideas will be greatly appreciated!
THANKS

item.title: 508-562 Client Help!
item.dc:creator: @starface starface
item.description:
@starface wrote:

I know that problem.
It stand: jdk5.7_21 or something. Swift that to your JDK Version. Go to Computer, Program Files and so java. There it stand.

Read full topic

item.title: 508-562 Client Help!
item.dc:creator: @Project_Realm Project Realm
item.description:
@Project_Realm wrote:

Look in the folder where your .bat file is, and find a folder in there named “files”. Go into that folder. If “client.class” is NOT located in that folder, that’s your problem. To fix, make sure ALL compiled files (.class extension) are in the “files” folder, and try to run the .bat again.

Read full topic

item.title: 508-562 Client Help!
item.dc:creator: @jerak jerak
item.description:
@jerak wrote:

@echo off
title 525
cd files
java -Xmx256m client 66 live live software members english game1
pause

Read full topic

at java.lang.ClassLoader.loadClass(Unknown Source)
Could not find the main class: client. Program will exit.
Press any key to continue…[/quote]

Do you use a “.bat” file to run your client? If so, can you post the contents of that file on here?
